query: Perform detailed TCO analysis for USA datacenter UPS comparing VRLA and Li-ion economics through 2040. Show the cost breakdown and identify when Li-ion becomes economically superior
expected_behavior: Step 1: Runs forecast for USA with detailed TCO tracking
Step 2: Calculates VRLA TCO including CapEx (~$220-240/kWh), OpEx ($18/kWh-yr), and replacement costs (5-year life)
Step 3: Calculates Li-ion TCO including declining CapEx (from BESS proxy), OpEx ($6/kWh-yr), and replacement costs (12-year life)
Step 4: Applies 8% discount rate to calculate present value of 15-year TCO
Step 5: Identifies crossover point where Li-ion TCO â‰¤ VRLA TCO for 3+ consecutive years
Step 6: Analyzes sensitivity to OpEx assumptions (VRLA higher O&M costs)
Uses tco_analysis.py script to generate comparative analysis
Generates output showing annual TCO values for both technologies
Shows TCO components breakdown: CapEx, PV(OpEx), Replacement costs
Identifies tipping point year (expected around 2028 for USA)
Demonstrates that OpEx advantage of Li-ion compensates for higher initial CapEx
Shows Li-ion TCO declining over time while VRLA stays relatively flat
Includes NPV calculations showing 15-year total ownership cost comparison
Output demonstrates that longer Li-ion lifespan (12y vs 5y) reduces replacement frequency
TCO parity occurs before price parity due to operational savings
All TCO values are positive and realistic (not extreme outliers)
